i working in a publishing building.

participant_2.background:
I am passionate about civic engagement and making my voice heard.

i like action movies.

I enjoy spending my free time reading about different cultures, and learning about the world.

content.text: Hey there! How's your day going?
Hi! It's going well so far, thanks for asking! How about yours?
It's going okay. I'm just working on a project at the moment.
It's a book about ballet. I'm a professional ballet dancer, and I'm writing a book about my experiences.
That's so interesting! I love ballet. I took lessons when I was younger, but I had to stop because of an injury.
Oh, that's too bad! I'm glad you got to experience it, though.
Yeah, it was a lot of fun. I've always been interested in other cultures, so I like reading about different countries and their history.
Me too! I think it's important to be aware of the world around us.
I agree. It's also important to be kind to ourselves. I've been trying to be kinder to myself lately, and it's been really helpful.
That's great! I'm glad to hear that. It's important to take care of yourself, both physically and mentally.
I know, right? I'm trying to do better at that.
